actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the President of the Senate and the President of the Senate pro tempore to make certain appointments after the sine die adjournment of the present session.

summary.text: Authorizes the President of the Senate and the President pro tempore to make appointments to commissions or committees authorized by law during the sine die adjournment of the Congress.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the President of the Senate and the President of the Senate pro tempore to make certain appointments after the sine die adjournment of the present session.
